# accountType

**Instance Property**

The type of service account.

## Declaration

```swift
var accountType: ACAccountType! { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property is required. You specify the account type using the [doc://com.apple.accounts/documentation/Accounts/ACAccount/init(accountType:)] method. You can use the [doc://com.apple.accounts/documentation/Accounts/ACAccountStore/accounts(with:)] method to retrieve all accounts of a particular type.

## Accessing Properties

- **accountDescription**: A human-readable description of the account.
- **credential**: The credential used to authenticate the user of this account.
- **identifier**: A unique identifier for this account.
- **username**: The username for this account.
- **userFullName**: The full name associated with the user account.
